articles.author: Barney Ronay
articles.title: Messi and PSG: a warning from history – and for Manchester United - The Guardian
articles.description: The ageing superstar being politically weaponised in two states’ soft-power plays carries cautionary lessons for the Premier League
articles.content: So this is how the end comes. Not with a bang. Not with a whimper. Not with a potentially decisive Ligue 1 double header against Troyes and Ajaccio. But instead with a trail of politically weaponised… [+14614 chars]

articles.author: Lorenzo Tondo, Angela Giuffrida
articles.title: Son of mafia boss killed during Naples football celebrations - The Guardian
articles.description: Police investigating whether Vincenzo Costanzo was gunned down by rival clan or shot by accident
articles.content: The 26-year-old son of an alleged mafia boss was shot dead and more than a hundred people were injured on Thursday during delirious celebrations by football fans in Naples, after the citys team won i… [+4226 chars]
